Package examples

Class SamplePiece

java.lang.Object
examples.SamplePiece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Piece, Cloneable
public class SamplePiece extends Object implements Piece
Partial implementation of the Piece interface for experimentation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a SamplePiece at the given position.

    Returns a new array of Cell objects representing the icons in this piece with their absolute positions (relative positions plus position of bounding box).

    Returns the position of this piece (upper-left corner of its bounding box).

    Sets the cells in this piece, making a deep copy of the given array.
    void

    Shifts the position of this piece down (increasing the row) by one.
    void
    shiftLeft()
    Shifts the position of this piece left (decreasing the column) by one.
    void
    shiftRight()
    Shifts the position of this piece right (increasing the column) by one.
    void
    transform()
    Transforms this piece without altering its position according to the rules of the game to be implemented.

    • getCells

      public Cell[] getCells()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Returns a deep copy of the Cell objects in this piece. The cell positions are relative to the upper-left corner of its bounding box.
      Specified by:
      getCells in interface Piece
      Returns:
      copy of the cells in this piece

    • getCellsAbsolute

      public Cell[] getCellsAbsolute()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Returns a new array of Cell objects representing the icons in this piece with their absolute positions (relative positions plus position of bounding box).
      Specified by:
      getCellsAbsolute in interface Piece
      Returns:
      copy of the cells in this piece, with absolute positions

    • shiftDown

      public void shiftDown()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Shifts the position of this piece down (increasing the row) by one. No bounds checking is done.
      Specified by:
      shiftDown in interface Piece

    • shiftLeft

      public void shiftLeft()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Shifts the position of this piece left (decreasing the column) by one. No bounds checking is done.
      Specified by:

    • shiftRight

      public void shiftRight()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Shifts the position of this piece right (increasing the column) by one. No bounds checking is done.
      Specified by:
      shiftRight in interface Piece

    • transform

      public void transform()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Transforms this piece without altering its position according to the rules of the game to be implemented. Typical operations would be rotation or reflection. No bounds checking is done.
      Specified by:
      transform in interface Piece

    • cycle

      public void cycle()
      Description copied from interface: Piece
      Cycles the icons within the cells of this piece. Each icon is shifted forward to the next cell (in the original ordering of the cells). The last icon wraps around to the first cell.
      Specified by:
      cycle in interface Piece
